content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello, Juan. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment quite comfortable and convenient. Let's discuss the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also affordable. I'm a student, so I'm on a tight budget. I was hoping we could start around 800 Euros per month. Is that a price that might work for you?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: 800 Euros per month is a very reasonable starting point, considering the size and location of the apartment. I think we can work with that. Would you be willing to sign a one-year lease with that price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: A one-year lease sounds good to me, especially if it comes with a fixed price. I'm looking for stability and predictability, so I'm happy to commit to a year at 800 Euros per month. Is that a deal we can shake on?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Excellent! It's a pleasure doing business with you, Juan. I appreciate your straightforwardness and willingness to commit. Yes, we can certainly shake on that deal. Welcome to the neighborhood! Is there anything else you need to discuss before we finalize the lease?
name: Heinrich Heine
